data.author: Jacob Perron
data.message:
Install executable rqt_graph (#49)

* Install exectuable rqt_graph

This fixes a regression introduced in #42.

Now the application can be started with 'rqt_graph' or with 'ros2 run'

Signed-off-by: Jacob Perron <jacob@openrobotics.org>

* Revert "Add setup.cfg with script install directories (#42)"

This reverts commit 4139a3957acc0b3e2e8258cca9ddb46f62258190.

* Install entrypoint to bin/ and executable to lib/rqt_graph/

Signed-off-by: Jacob Perron <jacob@openrobotics.org>

* Move script to 'scripts' directory

Signed-off-by: Jacob Perron <jacob@openrobotics.org>

data.author: Alejandro Hernández Cordero
data.message:
Add setup.cfg with script install directories (#42)

This fixes an issue running rqt_graph with ros2run on Windows.
ros2run expects scripts to be in the lib directory.

Signed-off-by: ahcorde <ahcorde@gmail.com>

data.author: Martin Günther
data.message:
Replace str() by unicode() (#17)

* Replace str() by unicode()

This fixes the following bug: If the user entered a non-ASCII character
into one of the filter text boxes (for example, by hitting the 'u umlaut' key on a
German keyboard), the application crashed before with the following
error:

    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "/home/martin/ros/kinetic/rqt_graph/src/rqt_graph/src/rqt_graph/ros_graph.py", line 69, in splitPath
        path = str(path.split(',')[-1]).lstrip(' ')
    UnicodeEncodeError: 'ascii' codec can't encode character u'\xfc' in position 16: ordinal not in range(128)

This commit fixes that.

* Check for missing unicode() function (py3)

data.author: Kartik Mohta
data.message: Edge class is unhashable so cannot put into a set, use a list instead (#16)

data.author: Dirk Thomas
data.message: update changelog

data.author: E2
data.message:
Added nested subnamespaces and more options to hide or group topics. (#13)

* Added nested subnamespaces.

The "Group Namespaces" checkbox has been replaced with a numeric spinner, where the user can specify the desired layers of depth.

* Moved the Hide section of the toolbar to a new line

* Grouped topics now display as 3d boxes.

* Added checkboxes to hide or group tf topics (/tf and /tf_static)

* Added checkbox to group image topics (/, /compressed, /theora, and /compressedDepth)


image_fix

* Added a checkbox to hide topics added by ros/dynamic_reconfigure.

Parameter topics include /parameter_descriptions and /parameter_updates.

* Changed dependency version, removed annoying margins in window

* Refactored lines to reduce redundancy, and minimize long lines of indent

* remove version dependency in order to work with Indigo

data.author: Dariush Forouher
data.message:
add displaying of topic/connection statistics along edges

if topic statistics are available (/statistics) then print
them along the edges (if in NODE_NODE mode).

Displayed are

* frequency, delay (based on the header.stamp) and traffic (in kb/s)
  as text
* delay again using the color of the edge is an indicator (green to red)
* traffic using the penwidth of the edge

data.author: William Woodall
data.message:
rqt_graph: changed the method of zooming

This new method handles smaller step sizes. The
trackpad on Macbook Pros have a step size which
ranges from +/-2 up to +/-1200, but with a normal
mouse, in OS X or Linux, the step size is always
+/-120 or +/-240. This new method scales better
with smaller step sizes, making scrolling
smoother when using a track pad, which was pretty
much useless before.

data.message:
Merge pull request #40 from stonier/patch-1

Background colour for the scene

data.author: Daniel Stonier
data.message:
Background colour for the scene

The ros graph plugin shows up badly in dark coloured qt themes (black ellipses on a dark background).

I usually don't like forcing colours in an themed application, but in a rendered scene, your theme doesn't have a choice over the colours of the components (black ellipses for the nodes, etc), so it's choice of matching background is often wrong. This helps with that.
